Within a 20 feet radius, you eminate an aura of utmost obedience. Anyone who damages you in the aura must either kneel or refuse
On kneel, they fall prone immediately as an action.
On refuse they take 1D6 psychic damage, increasing to 2D6 at level 4, 3D6 at level 8, 4D6 at level 12 , 5D6 at level 16 and 6D6 at level 20.
No matter they refuse or kneel, you gain +1 on attack rolls and weapon attacks do 2 extra damage of your domain type.

fields.name: Devoted Obedience
fields.description:
Temptation’s Redoubt - You can spend 2 devoted points as a reaction to remove any mental based effects. Provided the it is not from a spell 6th level or higher.

Steadfastness - You can spend 2 devoted points to make your aura difficult terrain.

fields.name: Divine Wall
fields.description:
You cannot be moved against your will, you have advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone, restrained or grappled. 

You can spend 2 devoted points to automatically succeed a saving throw against the above effects.

fields.name: Forcefully Command
fields.description:
Enemies in your aura must also take the kneel effect or you have advantage on all attacks against them

If they kneel they also take the damage associated with the refuse effect

fields.name: Divine Authority
fields.description:
You briefly exhibit the authority derived from your cause in its purest and most overbearing form.

You may activate this ability once per day as an 3 action. For one minute, you and friendly creatures within your aura are immune to fear and enchantment; further, when you use this ability, and as a action on every subsequent turn, you may issue a command to any number of creatures within 30’ as per the spell Command.

fields.name: Free from shackles
fields.description: You gain a +1 to checks to free from grappling

fields.name: Liberating Aura
fields.description: You emanate an aura of 25 feet.. Repeat saving throws inside are made with advantage, and any debilitating effects made have its effect reduced by one if applicable(to a min of one, so stun 2 becomes stun 1)

fields.name: Devoted Liberation
fields.description:
Unshackle - You can spend 2 devoted points to remove bindings, magical or non-magical. Or any restrain or grappling effect as 2 action within 40 feet

Freedom of Movement - You can spend 2 devoted points as an action to ensure an ally or you within 30 feet cannot have their movement speed reduced.

fields.name: Liberating Step
fields.description:
You free an ally from restraint. If the trigger was an ally taking damage, the ally reduces damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. The ally can attempt to break free of effects grabbing, restraining, immobilizing, or paralyzing them. They either attempt a new save against one such effect that allows a save, or attempt to Escape from one effect as a free action. Whether or not it needed to escape, the ally can then Step as a free action if it's able to move.

If the triggering enemy was using any effects to make your ally grabbed, restrained, immobilized, or paralyzed when you used Liberating Step, that enemy takes <your domain damage> equal to twice your Charisma modifier.

fields.name: Own will
fields.description: You always have advantage on will saving throw and you always roll a minimally 10 on it

fields.name: Soul of Salvation
fields.description:
As an 3 action once per long rest. You and everyone in your aura for the next minute

Cannot have speed reduced
Are immune to restrained, grapple, stun, frightened, terrified, petrified, weakened, charmed, dominated condition.

fields.name: Aura of Grandeur
fields.description:
An aura of divine grandeur surrounds you in a 20 feet radius.

Allies gain a +round up(paladin level/4) to saving throws

fields.name: Devoted Glory
fields.description:
Inspiring smite - Whenever you use smite, you can select an ally or yourself in the aura, to gain temproary hitpoint equal to <spent devoted point for smite>D6 

Font of Inspiration - Whenever you suceed a saving throw, or land a successfull attack or an enemy fails your saving throw. You can select an ally in your aura to gain a D6 inspiration dice spend 3 Devoted points.

fields.name: Inspiring saves
fields.description: Succeeding a saving throw allows your allies in your aura to have advantage against that same spell or ability for the next 24 hours.

fields.name: Glorious Intervention
fields.description:
Anyone in your aura who is targeted by an enemy in the aura, you can move up to 5 feet as a reaction and make an attack against the enemy before they make an attack. Your ally under attack gains 5 temporary hit points and if you hit the enemy has disadvantage on their attack against your ally. 

You lose an action on your next turn if you miss the attack or your ally is still hit

fields.name: Legendary Devotion
fields.description:
You can spend 5 devoted points and an action you gain the following benefits for 1 minute:

You are blessed with an otherworldly presence, gaining advantage on all Charisma checks.
Once on each of your turns when you make a weapon attack and miss, you can cause that attack to hit instead.
If you fail a saving throw, you can use your reaction to reroll it. You must use this new roll.

fields.name: Acid Blast
fields.description: On a simple flick, nature wrath explodes from the ground in a spray of acid
fields.effect: 1D8 Acid Damage, half on success

fields.name: Blade Ward
fields.description: You trace a sigil of warding in the air.
fields.effect: Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing damage

fields.name: Create simple ice
fields.description: You select a small amount of water, roughly abut 250ml or a cup and convert into ice cubes over 30 seconds or 15 actions.
fields.effect: Convert 250ml water into 5-10 ice cubes

fields.name: Electric Arc
fields.description: You summon a bolt of electrocty that unleashes itself on two creatures within range
fields.effect: 1D6 Lightning damage

fields.name: Fire Blade
fields.description: The caster touches a blade or projectile and sets it aflame. The next attack with that weapon does extra damage.
fields.effect: 1D6 Fire Damage
fields.components: V, M(Melee Weapon/ Projectile  to target)

fields.name: Firebolt
fields.description: The caster summons fire with its fingertip, conjuring a mote of flame bnefore hurling it at an enemy
fields.effect: 1D10 fire damage

fields.name: Flashbang
fields.description: You summon a sudden burst of bright light from your fingertips
fields.effect: Dazzled (1)
fields.duration: Till start of caster next turn

fields.name: Ghost Sound
fields.description: You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting

fields.name: Detect Magic
fields.description: You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic.
fields.effect:
You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower rank than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.
fields.upcast_effect:
(3rd) You learn the rank or level of the most powerful magical effect the spell detects, as determined by the GM.
Upcasted (4th) As 3rd rank, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-rank magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that

fields.name: Mage Hand
fields.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.
You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.
The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 5kg.

fields.name: Poison Spray
fields.description: A burst of poison appears from your fingertips
fields.effect: 1D6 Poison Damage on a failed save

fields.name: Spare the Dying
fields.description: You send energy out to a fallen body, keeping its key functions intact
fields.effect: Stabalise a creature

fields.name: Thunder Blade
fields.description: The caster gathers arcane force onto its blade and slams it into is foe. Make an attack as part of the spell.
fields.effect: 1D8(On hit) + 1D8 if target moves

fields.name: Withering Grasp
fields.description: Your fingers turn dark and cold as necrotic energy course through it
fields.effect: 1D10 Necrotic damage

fields.name: Illumination
fields.description: You light all non-magical light sources in the area that use fire to provide their light—such as candles, lamps, and sconces..
fields.effect: You can choose to make the emanation smaller than its maximum, to any distance of your choice. If a light source is attended by an unwilling creature, that creature can attempt a Reflex save to snuff the light out before it becomes noticeable

fields.name: Draw Moisture
fields.description: You draw up to a pint of water from the object; this dries objects of less than 1 kg. .
fields.effect: The water collects in a globule floating in your hand, which you can direct into a nearby container as part of Casting the Spell; otherwise, it splashes to the ground. Repeated applications of draw moisture can be used to dry larger objects, although doing so might take significant time. You can use this spell in especially humid environments to condense drinkable water from the air, though typically, you can't draw more than a few cups before depleting the ambient moisture

fields.name: Sigil
fields.description: You harmlessly place your unique magical sigi
fields.effect: The sigil,  1 square inch in size, on the targeted creature or object. The mark can be visible or invisible, and you can change it from one state to another by using an Interact action to touch the target. The mark can be scrubbed or scraped off with 5 minutes of work. If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of a week. The time before the mark fades increases depending on your   rank.
fields.upcast_effect:
3: Lasts 1 month
5: Lasts 1 year
7: Lasts forever

fields.name: Guided Strike
fields.description: Magic energy guides the casters strikes
fields.effect: +1 to hit and damage rolls
fields.duration: Till start of caster next turn

fields.name: Light
fields.description:
You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.
If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Reflexx saving throw to avoid the spell.
fields.upcast_effect: (4th) The light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

fields.name: Arcane Shield
fields.description: You create an magical shield if you hava free hand
fields.effect: You gain a +2 to armor, and can use the shield block reaction in which your shield are considered to have hardness of 5
fields.upcast_effect: Gain +5 to the damage reduction from shield block every 2 levels starting from level 3

fields.name: Mesage
fields.description: You send a message
fields.effect: You send a message of not more than 25 words that the creature hears

fields.name: Detect Metal
fields.description: You sense the presence of metal
fields.effect: You detect metal hidden by illusions (such as invisibility) only if the illusion has a lower rank than your detect metal spell. Against deceptive illusions, detect metal always notices an absence of metal when a non-metallic object is disguised as metallic. However, if the deception involves disguising one metallic object as another, such as pretending a copper coin is made of gold, detect metal registers only the presence of metal, not its type, even if the rank of your detect metal spell exceeds that of the illusion effect.
fields.upcast_effect: (3rd) You can discern all types of metal you detected. Your spell can overcome deceptive illusory spells hiding one metal as another if the magic effect's rank is lower than that of your detect metal spell.

fields.name: Guidance
fields.description: Your divine power manifest in a subtle guiding influence
fields.effect: +1 on Skill check
fields.upcast_effect:
4: +D3 on skill check
6: +D4 on skill chrck

fields.name: Radient Bolt
fields.description: The caster hurls a bolt of divine energy
fields.effect: 2D4 Radiant Damage

fields.name: Word of Radience
fields.description: Radiant Energy Explodes from you
fields.effect: 1D6 Radiant Damage

fields.name: Void Sting
fields.description: The void is summoned to cause harm
fields.effect: 2D4 Force Damage, enfeebled 1 on CF

fields.name: Know the Way
fields.description: You know the way
fields.effect: You know which is true north, and you also know the exact direction of a location

fields.name: Targetted Ward
fields.description: You ward against a specific creature
fields.effect: You select a hostile creature and a target you can touch.  The targetted creature gains a +2 to armor and +1 to saving throws against that hostile

fields.name: Edritch Shockwave
fields.description: You charge a blade with eldritch energy, sending ia wave of deadly force
fields.effect: Your next melee attack on hit with this weapon explodes, dealing 1D10 force damage in a 5foot radius. You ignore the damage from it

fields.name: Telekenetic Projectile
fields.description: You grab a lose object and hurl it at an enemy
fields.effect: Select an object less than 5kg that is small in size of less. You do 2D6 physical damage on a type determined by the GM

fields.name: Basic Fix
fields.description: You fix a simple object
fields.effect: You fix a non-magical, extremely simple object like a small wheel, a piece of rope. The damage cannot exceed more than 20cm in length

fields.name: Noise Cancel
fields.description: Noise becomes a distant, barely audible mummer
fields.effect: You gain the deafen condition. Sustained as long as you wish

fields.name: Snowball
fields.description: You summon a small snowball in your hand.
fields.effect: You can make it lethal or non-letha, damaging or non damaging. Make a ranged spell attack, doing 1D6 cold damage

fields.name: Gust of Wind
fields.description:
A violent wind issues forth from your palm, blowing from the point where you are when you Cast the Spell to the line's opposite end.
The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, blows objects of light Bulk or less around, and pushes larger objects. 
Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save. 
Large or smaller creatures that later move into the gust must attempt the save on entering.
fields.effect:
Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The creature can't move against the wind.
Failure The creature is knocked prone. 
If it was flying, it takes the effects of critical failure instead.
Critical Failure The creature is pushed 30 feet in the wind's direction, 
knocked prone, 
and takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Whispered Link
fields.description: You create a link that allows soft words to be heard
fields.effect: You select a creature so that when whispering, the creature can hear you loud and clearly from 120ft away

fields.name: Message
fields.description: You send a message
fields.effect: You send a message to a creature, speaking normally, the creature can hear you loud and clearly as long as you can see the creature and are within range

fields.name: Chill
fields.description: Using your fingers your transfer heat away
fields.effect: You reduce the tempature of a small object, small bodies of liquid or small pockets of gas not more 5ftx5ftx5ft to 1-10 dgrees provided it is not being contested by a magical source

fields.name: Bless
fields.description: Divine energy comes forward and touches 3 targets. if you cast bless on a target with bane, it removes bane
fields.effect: Those who gain Bless gain 1D4 on saving throws and attack rolls

fields.name: Bane
fields.description: Divine energy comes forward and curses 3 targets. if you cast bane on a target with bless, it removes bane
fields.effect: Those who gain bane subtract 1D4 from saving throws and attack rolls

fields.name: Create or Destroy Water
fields.description: You destroy or create water. the water you create is pure, while the water you destroy must be be at leats 90% pure water.
fields.effect:
Create Water: You create up to 5 gallons of clean water within range in an open container. Alternatively, the water falls as rain in a 30-foot cube within range, extinguishing exposed flames in the area.

Destroy Water: You destroy up to 5 gallons of water in an open container within range. Alternatively, you destroy fog in a 30-foot cube within range.

fields.name: Guiding Bolt
fields.description: You gather and hurl a bolt of divine energy, upon hit it leaves behind a glowing mark
fields.effect: 4D6 Radiant Damage on hit, for the next minute, the next attack against that creature gains advantage

fields.name: Healing Word
fields.description: You speak a word of divine healing
fields.effect: The selected creature regain 2D4 hitpoints

fields.name: Healing Hands
fields.description: Your hands are imbued with healing energy
fields.effect: The select creature regains 2D10 hitpoints, if you touch an undead, you instead do 2D10 Radiant damage and you make a spell attack.

fields.name: Divine Blade
fields.description: You select a blade and imbue it with radiant energy
fields.effect: The melee weapon attack does radiant damage, and it gains a +3 to hit.

fields.name: Armor of Faith
fields.description: Radiant energy hardens an armor
fields.effect: You touch a piece of armor its armor score is increase by (current armor score/10) + 1, round up and it gains Ward 5

fields.name: Spirit Link
fields.description: You form a spiritual link with another creature, taking in its pain.
fields.effect:
When you Cast this Spell and at the start of each of your turns, if the target is below maximum Hit Points, it regains 2 Hit Points (or the difference between its current and maximum Hit Points, if that's lower). You lose as many Hit Points as the target regained.

This is a spiritual transfer, so no effects apply that would increase the Hit Points the target regains or decrease the Hit Points you lose. This transfer also ignores any temporary Hit Points you or the target have. Since this effect doesn't involve vitality or void energy, spirit link works even if you or the target is undead. While the duration persists, you gain no benefit from Biomancy or fast healing. You can Dismiss this spell, and if you're ever at 0 Hit Points, spirit link ends automatically.

fields.name: Sanctuary
fields.description: You create a divine ward that deters attacks
fields.effect:
. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a willl saving throw.  Creatures attempting to attack the target must attempt a Will save each time. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends.

Critical Success Sanctuary ends.
Success The creature can attempt its attack and any other attacks against the target this turn.
Failure The creature can't attack the target and wastes the action. It can't attempt further attacks against the target this turn.
Critical Failure The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack the target for the rest of sanctuary's duration.

fields.name: Mage Bolt
fields.description: Your hurl a bolt of pure arcane energy
fields.effect: 2D12 Force Damage, +10 armor piercing

fields.name: Lightning Stream
fields.description: A stream of lightning erupts from your arcane focus, contionusly striking foe.
fields.effect: 1D12 Lightning damage, you can sustain this spell on subsequent turns, if you make an attack against the same creature that you had hit with this spell the previous turn you gain a +1 to hit. When this spell us active, you cannot cast spells below your   level or with the M or F components

fields.name: Ventriloquism
fields.description: Whenever you speak or make any other sound vocally, you can make your vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and you can change that apparent location freely as you vocalize. Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.
fields.upcast_effect: 2: The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.

fields.name: Schadenfreude
fields.effect:
CSu : the creature is unaffected.
Su : the creature is distracted by its amusement and takes a –1 status penalty on Perception checks and Will saves for 1 round.
Fa :the creature is overcome by its amusement and is stupefied 1 for 1 round.
CFa : the creature is lost in its amusement and is stupefied 2 for 1 round and stunned 1.

fields.name: Tailwind
fields.description:
The wind at your back pushes you to find new horzions, you gain a  +10-foot status bonus to your speed
Heightend(2nd) The duration increases to 8 hours
fields.effect: See Desc.

fields.name: True Strike
fields.description:
The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll it twice and use the better result. 
The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden. You are then temporarily immune to sure strike for 10 minutes.

fields.name: Fear
fields.description: You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save
fields.effect:
CSu : the creature is unaffected.
Su : the target is frightened 1
Fa : The target is frightened 2
CFa : The target is frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 round

fields.name: Hydraulic Push
fields.description:
You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. 
Make a ranged spell attack roll.

Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.

  (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.

fields.name: Illusory Object
fields.description:
You create an illusory visual image of a stationary object. The entire image must fit within the spell's area.
The object appears to animate naturally, but it doesn't make sounds or generate smells. 
For example, water would appear to pour down an illusory waterfall, but it would be silent.

Any creature that touches the image 
or uses the Seek action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

  (2nd) Your image makes appropriate sounds, generates normal smells, and feels right to the touch. The spell gains the auditory and olfactory traits. The duration increases to 1 hour.
  (5th) As the 2nd-rank version, but the duration is unlimited.

fields.name: Force Seeker
fields.description: You raise a hand, sending highly accurate seeking darts of pure arcane energy flying
fields.effect:
1 Action: 1 Dart 
2 Action: 3 Dart 
3 Action: 5 Dart

Each Dart does 1D4 force damage and automatically hits their target.
fields.upcast_effect: 3(+1) Fire additional Dart for 2 and 3 Actions

fields.name: Summon Animal
fields.description:
You summon a creature that has the animal trait and whose level is –1 to fight for you.

  (2nd) Level 1.
  (3rd) Level 2.
  (4th) Level 3.
  (5th) Level 5.
  (6th) Level 7.
  (7th) Level 9.
  (8th) Level 11.
  (9th) Level 13.
  (10th) Level 15.

fields.name: Phantasmal minion
fields.description:
You summon a phantasmal minion. 
The minion is roughly the shape of a humanoid. 
You can choose to have it be invisible or have an ephemeral appearance, 
but it's obviously a magical effect, not a real creature.

fields.name: Dehydrate
fields.description:
You stir the inner fire of all things within the area, driving out moisture. 
All creatures in the area take 1d6 persistent fire damage with a basic Fortitude save; 
creatures with the water or plant traits get a result one degree of success worse than they rolled. 
The spell ends for a creature when its persistent damage ends.

A creature affected by dehydrate attempts an additional Fortitude save at the end of each of its turns, 
before rolling to recover from the persistent damage. 
It can forgo this additional save if it consumed water or a similar hydrating liquid 
within the last round (drinking typically requires a single action).

Success The creature takes no additional effect.
Failure The creature is enfeebled 1 until the end of its next turn.
Critical Failure The creature is enfeebled 2 until the end of its next turn.

fields.name: Sharpened Blade
fields.description: You make a blade extrodinarily Sharp
fields.effect: A melee weapon gains a +4 armor piercing

fields.name: Hideous Laughter
fields.description: You compel a creature to burst into unending laughter
fields.effect:
CF The target becomes prone and gains the stunned 3 condition
F The target gains the stunned 1 condition and cannot use reactions
S The target cannot take reactions
CS No effect

fields.name: Echoing Weapon
fields.description: You channel magical energy into the target weapon, and the air around it faintly hums each time you strike a blow, as the impact is absorbed into the weapon.
fields.effect: If a creature is wielding the weapon at the end of its turn, the weapon discharges a burst of sound targeting one creature adjacent to the wielder (if any). The sonic damage this deals is equal to the number of successful Strikes with the target weapon that the wielder made from the previous turn                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (to a maximum of 4 sonic damage if the wielder hits with four Strikes).

fields.name: Respite
fields.effect: The targetted creature gains 1D10 hitpoints at the end of its next turn. Double the dice rolled from the spell if the creature did not take damage.

fields.name: Kinetic Ram
fields.description: Gathering kinetic energy, you either focus it in a straight line or disperse it as an encircling ripple.
fields.effect:
[one-action] The spell targets one creature within 15 feet.
    [two-actions] The spell targets one creature within 30 feet. The distance the target is pushed if it fails is doubled, and on a critical failure, the target is also knocked prone and takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage.
    [three-actions] The spell targets all creatures in a 5-foot emanation.

fields.name: Beastial Wildform
fields.description: The caster channels the power of beastial wrath
fields.effect: The target does +2 damage to strength based melee attacks

fields.name: False Life
fields.description: The caster creates an aura of false life to protect itself
fields.effect: Gain 2D12 temporary hitpoint for one minute

fields.name: Life Bloom
fields.description: The caster calls forth nature to allow one to regain lifeforce
fields.effect: The creature gains 1D6 hitpoints at the start of its next turn for the next 3 turns
fields.upcast_effect: 2(+1) increase the dice by one tier. if It hits 1D12, increase it by one more turn

fields.name: Snow Ball Storm
fields.description: A hail of snowballs pepper an area continously
fields.effect:
Dozens of snow balls rain down persistently in an area. Targets inside must make a basic save at the end of your turn. Taking half damage on a success


2D4 Cold Damage

fields.name: Cauterise Fire
fields.description: Using fire you cauterise a wound
fields.effect: Using controlled heat you seal of a wound

fields.name: Claws of Fire
fields.description: You give yourself flaming claws
fields.effect: 5D6 Fire damage on hit, ignores armor

fields.name: Arms of Hadar
fields.description: Tendrils of dark void energy explode around you, grabbing targets a
fields.effect:
2D8 Necrotic damage

CF: Full damage, target cannot take reactions and speed reduced by half
F: Full damage, target cannot take reactions 
S: Half Damage
CS: No Damage

fields.name: Spray Color
fields.description: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand.
fields.effect: Roll 6d10; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can effect. Creatures in a 15-foot cone originating from you are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring unconscious creatures and creatures that can’t see). Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell is blinded until the spell ends. Subtract each creature’s hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature’s hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.

fields.name: Detect Poison and Disease
fields.description: You can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases

fields.name: Divine Favor
fields.description: You call upon strength and wisdom of the divine
fields.effect: +1 to attack rolls and damage rolls

fields.name: Enchant Ensnaring Weapon
fields.description: You enchant your weapon with grasping ensnaring weapon
fields.effect:
The selected weapon gains the ensnaring property. Meaning targets it attacks must make a saving throw.  They may attempt a repeat save at the end of their turn.

CF: The target is restrained and takes 1D6 piercing damage until they break free
F: The target has its speed reduced to 0 and takes 1D6 piercing damage until they break free
S: Your attack does 1D6 extra piercing damage 
CS: No effect
fields.components: V, F, M(A melee or ranged weapon)

fields.name: Grease
fields.description: You coat an area in slippery oil
fields.effect:
The area is turned into difficult terrain

When the grease appears, each creature standing in its area must succeed on a saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a saving throw or fall prone.

fields.name: Smoke Cloud
fields.description: You create a cloud of smoke
fields.effect: . The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.

fields.name: Hex
fields.description: The caster uses a simple curse against a target
fields.effect: Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack. Also, choose one ability when you cast the spell. The target has disadvantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability. If you kill an enemy with this spell casted on it, you can move it as an action without recasting it

fields.name: Jump
fields.description: You give the caster enhanced leaping power
fields.effect: Your legs surge with strength, ready to leap high and far. You jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action.

fields.name: Longstrider
fields.description: You bless someone with enhanced speed and endurance
fields.effect: You increase the speed of the target by 10ft

fields.name: Shield of Faith
fields.description: You summon a divine ward of energy
fields.effect: The target gains Ward +2

fields.name: Snare
fields.description: You create a simple snare trap

fields.name: Mage Armor
fields.description: The caster creates an simple interlocking of arcane energy that shields
fields.effect: The creature gains an armor score of 15. This only works if the creature is not wearing armor

fields.name: Ward
fields.description: The caster extends its hand, creating warding magical energues
fields.effect: The caster gains a +3 ward

fields.name: Tremor
fields.description: Youu touch the ground, causing a light tremor
fields.effect: Those in the area must make a basic reflex save or be knocked prone and take 1D6 bludgeoning damage

fields.name: Distort Value
fields.description: You create false illusions making an object seem more or less valuab;e
fields.effect: You can make any object seem one tier higher or lower in value, requiring a relevant skill check against your DC to realise

fields.name: Command
fields.description: You speak a single word of command.
fields.effect:
The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn't understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it.

Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the DM determines how the target behaves. If the target can't follow your command, the spell ends.

Approach: The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop: The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee: The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel: The target falls prone and then ends its turn.

Halt: The target doesn't move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

fields.name: Alarm
fields.description: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion.
fields.effect:
Choose a door, a window, or an area within range that is no larger than a 20-foot cube. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever a tiny or larger creature touches or enters the warded area. When you cast the spell, you can designate creatures that won't set off the alarm. You also choose whether the alarm is mental or audible.

A mental alarm alerts you with a ping in your mind if you are within 1 mile of the warded area. This ping awakens you if you are sleeping.

An audible alarm produces the sound of a hand bell for 10 seconds within 60 feet.

fields.name: Carryall
fields.description: A small platform of magical force materializes adjacent to you to carry cargo. It is invisible or has a ghostly appearance,
fields.effect:
A small platform of magical force materializes adjacent to you to carry cargo. It is invisible or has a ghostly appearance, is 2 feet in diameter, and follows 5 feet behind you, floating just above the ground. It holds up to 50kg of objects (if they can fit on it). Any objects atop the platform fall to the ground when the spell ends. You can Sustain the spell to move the platform up to 30 feet along the ground, to make it stay in place, or to have it return to you and resume following you.

The spell ends if a creature tries to ride atop the platform, if the platform is overloaded, if anyone tries to lift or force the platform higher above the ground, or if you move more than 60 feet away from the platform.
fields.upcast_effect: 4: Increase the weight limit to 100kg and creatures can ride on top of it.

fields.name: Befuddle
fields.description: You sow seeds of confusion in your target's mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.
fields.effect:
The target makes a saving throw.

CF: The target gains weakened(dexterity)2 and weakened(intelligence) 1
F: They gain Weakened(dexterity) 2 
S: They gain weakened(dexterity 1)
CS: N/A
fields.upcast_effect: 3(+1): You can recast the spell as part of a sustain 1 action if the target had failed or critically failed

fields.name: Air Buddle
fields.description: You create a pocket of breathable air
fields.effect: The selected creature can breath air normally for the spell duration
fields.upcast_effect:
2(+1): You can select 2 additional creatures
2: You do not need concentration anymore

fields.name: Charm Person
fields.description: You use spells to amplify an act, charming the mind.
fields.effect:
must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.
Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell.
Failure The target's attitude becomes friendly toward you. If it was friendly, it becomes helpful. It can't use hostile actions against you.
Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.
fields.upcast_effect:
4: The duration lasts until your next long rest
8th: The duration lasts until your next long rest, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

fields.name: Juvenile Companion
fields.description: You transform an animal into its juvenile form, such as a cub, foal, kitten, puppy, or piglet, making the target appear harmless.
fields.effect:
You transform a willing animal to its juvenile form, such as a cub, foal, kitten, puppy, or piglet, making the target appear harmless. It becomes Tiny (if it was larger), and its reach is reduced to 0 feet. All of its Speeds are halved (to a minimum Speed of 5 feet), and it gains weakness 5 to physical damage. In all other ways, its abilities and statistics are unchanged.

If your companion uses a hostile action, juvenile companion ends. This spell has no effect on a companion that doesn't have a juvenile form.

fields.name: Mask Scent
fields.description: You used a spell to mask a smell
fields.effect: You can hide a smell and the source of it for the duration of the spell, ensuring it is undetectable by any means
fields.upcast_effect:
2: Increase duration to 8 hour
3: Increase duration to 24 hour

fields.name: Create Scent
fields.description: You create a smell
fields.effect: You create a source of a smell of your choosing, there is no negative effect that the spell can produce unless the GM decides otherwise
fields.upcast_effect:
2: Increase duration to 8 hour
3: Increase duration to 24 hour

fields.name: Pet Cache
fields.description: You create a dimension to store pets
fields.effect:
You open your cloak or create a gap with your hands, drawing the willing target into a pocket dimension just large enough for its basic comfort. No other creature can enter this extradimensional space, and the target can bring along objects only if they were designed to be worn by a creature of its kind. The space has enough air, food, and water to sustain the target for the duration.

You can Dismiss the spell. The spell also ends if you die or enter an extradimensional space. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the nearest unoccupied space (outside of any extradimensional space you may have entered).

fields.name: Purify Water
fields.description: You remove impurities in water
fields.effect: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

fields.name: Wooden Fist
fields.description: You turn a fist into solid wood
fields.effect: Your arms and hands swell with new growth, transforming into tree trunks twice as big as their current size. Your fists deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, lose the nonlethal trait, and have reach.
fields.upcast_effect:
2(+1): Increase damage by 1D6 to a max of 4D6

3: Duration increase to 10 min
4: Duration increase to 1 hour

fields.name: Advantaged Attacks
fields.description: You give someone strangely reliable attacks
fields.effect: The targetted creatures gain advantage on weapon and unarmed attack rolls
fields.upcast_effect:
3: increase duration to 1 hour
5: Remove the concentration tag

fields.name: Sleep
fields.description: With a command and spell, you magically put someone to sleep.
fields.effect:
Each creature in the area becomes drowsy, possibly nodding off. A creature that falls unconscious from this spell doesn't fall prone or release what it's holding. This spell doesn't prevent creatures from waking up due to a successful Perception check, limiting its utility in combat.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The creature takes a –1 status penalty to Perception checks for 1 round.
Failure The creature falls unconscious. If it's still unconscious after 1 minute, it wakes up automatically.
Critical Failure The creature falls unconscious. If it's still unconscious after 1 hour, it wakes up automatically.
fields.upcast_effect: 4: The creatures fall unconscious for 1 round on a failure or 1 minute on a critical failure. They fall prone and release what they're holding, and they can't attempt Perception checks to wake up. When the duration ends, the creature is sleeping normally instead of automatically waking up.

fields.name: Protect Undead
fields.description: You create a necrotic ward to bolster the undead
fields.effect: The selected undead creatures gain Ward 5
fields.upcast_effect:
2(+1) Increase the ward value 1
2(+1) Select additional creature

fields.name: Mending
fields.description: You repair an item
fields.effect: You regain 6 hitpoints of that item, repairing it. The item can be any non-living object or a construct

fields.name: Lock
fields.description: You create an arcane lock
fields.effect:
The target's latch mechanism clinks shut, held fast by unseen magical wards. When you magically lock a target, you set an Athletics and Thievery DC to open it equal to your spell DC or the base lock DC with a +4 status bonus, whichever is higher. Any key or combination that once opened a lock affected by this spell does not do so for the duration of the spell, though the key or combination does grant a +4 circumstance bonus to checks to open the door.

If the target is opened, the spell ends. Assuming the target is not barred or locked in some additional way, you can unlock and open it with an Interact action during which you touch the target. This does not end the spell. You can Dismiss this spell at any time and from any distance.
fields.upcast_effect: 2: You can add a M component worth 1 GP that is a fist size, extending the duration to 100 years

fields.name: Enchant Shield
fields.description: You use energies to enhance a shield
fields.effect: You give a shield a +1 property and a +2 to its hardness

fields.name: Summon undead
fields.description: You summon an undead
fields.effect: You summon a creature that has the undead trait and whose level is –1 to fight for you.
fields.upcast_effect:
(2nd) Level 1.
  (3rd) Level 2.
  (4th) Level 3.
  (5th) Level 5.
  (6th) Level 7.
  (7th) Level 9.
  (8th) Level 11.
  (9th) Level 13.
  (10th) Level 15.

fields.name: Sound Wall
fields.description: A wall of that prevents mundane sound from travelling one side to the other is erected
fields.effect: Any normal mundane sound cannot travel between the wall. You can choose to make the wall a sphere. Loud sounds like screams, gunshots, explosions are softened but still can be heard
fields.upcast_effect: 2(+1) Increase sphere by 5ft and wall by 10ft

fields.name: Range Find

fields.name: Augury
fields.description: By casting gem-inlaid sticks, rolling dragon bones, laying out ornate cards, or employing some other divining tool, you receive an omen from an otherworldly entity about the results of a specific course of action that you plan to take within the next 30 minutes
fields.effect:
The GM rolls a secret DC 6 flat check. On a failure, the result is always “nothing.” This makes it impossible to tell whether a “nothing” result is accurate. If anyone asks about the same topic as the first casting of augury during an additional casting, the GM uses the secret roll result from the first casting. If circumstances change, though, it's possible to get a different result.

The GM chooses from the following possible omens:
Weal, for good results
Woe, for bad results
Weal and woe, for both good and bad results
Nothing, for results that aren’t especially good or bad
The spell doesn’t take into account any possible circumstances that might change the outcome, such as the casting of additional spells or the loss or gain of a companion.
If you cast the spell two or more times before completing your next long rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get a random reading. The GM makes this roll in secret.

fields.name: Dream Message

Any creature that crosses the wall or is occupying the wall's area at the start of its turn takes 2D8 Radiant Damage if it is evil, unholy or in opposition to your god or pateron if applicable
fields.target: 5-foot-thick wall in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high or a 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-radius ring with the same height. T

fields.name: Safe Passege
fields.description: A passage is protected by your magic to be as safe as possible
fields.effect:
Anyone passing through the area gains the following benefits against harmful effects of the terrain and environment, including environmental damage, hazardous terrain, and hazards in the area. The spell grants a +2 bonus to dodge and +4 to armor, with a +2 and saves against such effects, and reduced all damage by 5 from such effects. Furthermore, the spell prevents anything in the area that's prone to collapse, such as a rickety bridge or an unstable ceiling, from collapsing, except under extreme strain that would collapse a normal structure of its type.

Safe passage protects only against harm, not inconvenience, and it doesn't reduce difficult terrain, remove the concealed condition caused by precipitation, or the like, nor does it protect against creatures within the spell's area.,
fields.upcast_effect:
5(+3) The damage reduction is doubled from the previous.

8: Increase the area to 600ft

fields.name: Locate

fields.effect: You learn the direction to the target (if you picked a specific object, such as “my mother's sword”) or the nearest target (if you picked a type of object, such as “swords”). If the target is a specific object, you must have observed it directly with your own senses. If it's a type of object, you still need to have an accurate mental image of the type of object. If there's lead or running water between you and the target, this spell can't locate the object. This means you might find a type of object farther away if the nearest one is behind lead or running water.
fields.upcast_effect: (5th) You can target a specific creature or ancestry instead of an object, but you must have met or seen up close the creature or ancestry you want to target.

fields.name: Glyph of Warding

While Casting this Spell, you also Cast a Spell of a lower spell level to store in the glyph. The stored spell must take 3 actions or fewer to cast, have a hostile effect, and target one creature or have an area. You can set a password, a trigger, or both for the glyph. Any creature that moves, opens, or touches the target container or enters the target area that doesn't speak the password or that matches the trigger activates the glyph, releasing the harmful spell within.

Once a spell is stored in the glyph, the glyph gains all the traits of that spell. If the stored spell targets one or more creatures, it targets the creature that set off the glyph. If it has an area, that area is centered on the creature that set off the glyph. Glyph of warding's duration ends when the glyph is triggered. The glyph counts as a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and the Thievery check to disable it; both checks require the creature attempting them to be trained in order to succeed.

You can Dismiss glyph of warding. The maximum number of glyphs of warding you can have active at a time is equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

fields.name: Aganoising Despair
fields.description: You project and force down the creatures worst fears. Destroying its mind
fields.effect:
4D6 Psyhic Damage

Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target takes half damage and becomes frightened 1.
Failure The target takes full damage and becomes frightened 2.
Critical Failure The target takes double damage and becomes frightened 3.

fields.name: Resuscitate
fields.description: You send a burst of healing energy in an attempt to resucsitate them
fields.effect:
The target must not have been dead for more than 1 minute. The body must be intact, with no vital organ missing or damaged. Make a spellcasting check. If the target has the wounded condition, reduce their roll by twice the wounded value.

1-9: The spell fails, and you cannot attempt to use this spell again on that target
10-20: The spell fails, and has no effect. 
21-26: The spell suceeds, and the target comes back to life with 1HP and the wounded(3) condition and 3 tiers of exhaustion
27 -31 The target comes back to life with 1HP the wounded(2) condition and 2 tiers of exhaustion
32- 37: The target comes back to life with 1HP the wounded(1) condition and 1 tiers of exhaustion
38 and above: The target comes back to life with 1HP and the wounded(1) condition

Once you use this on a target, it cannot be casted again on that target for the next 5 days
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1): Increase the spellcasting check roll by 1
fields.components: V, F, M(50g worth of holy materials(e.g powder, holy oil)

fields.name: Linked Sending
fields.description: You send a message
fields.effect: You send a simple message of not more then 100 words to a creature you know and has established the link with. You can establish the link by first casting this spell on it

fields.name: Curse Exorcisim
fields.description: You use your divine powers to force a curse out
fields.effect: Your touch grants a reprieve to a cursed creature. You use a spell check to try to get rid one curse afflicting the target. If the curse comes from a cursed item or other external source, a success indicates that the target creature can rid itself of the cursed item, but it doesn't remove the curse from the item
fields.components: V, F, M(50g of holy material)

fields.name: Spirit Guardians
fields.description: Divine spirits appear you, striking those around you
fields.effect:
Creatures who enter the range of spirit guardian, or end their turn in it are subjected to the effect. You can choose who to be affected when they enter or create this field

You make a spell attack against the creature. This attack gains +2 armor piercing and does 3D8 radiant damage on hit;

fields.name: Heat Vision
fields.description: You can see the outlines of heat
fields.effect: The target visually senses the heat energy emitted by the creatures and objects around it, gaining infrared vision at a range of 60 feet as a precise sense. This vision can detect any warm-blooded creature or source of heat not completely covered behind a solid object, such as a wall; this bypasses any concealement granted by smoke or darkness. It can similarly detect especially cold creatures and sources of cold. Almost all creatures with the cold or fire trait can be detected with heatvision. Undead and constructs are typically the same temperature as their environment and can't be detected with heatvision. The GM decides in other cases.
fields.upcast_effect: (6th) The duration lasts until you next make your daily preparations, and the range increases to 120 feet.,

fields.name: Divine Health
fields.description: Divine Energy reaches out and closes wounds and improve vitality
fields.effect: Select a creature in range, the selected creature regains 10 + 4D6 hitpoints and excess hitpoint is converted into temporary hitpoint

fields.name: Divine Vitality
fields.description: You have divine blessed vitality
fields.effect: Gain advantage on saving throws against poison and for healing effects and you always heal the maximum of dice values. Once you gain this effect, the spellcaster must sustain it.

fields.name: Daylight
fields.description: The light of the sun blooms
fields.effect:
A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range. The sphere is bright light and sheds dim light for an additional 60 feet.
If you chose a point on an object you are holding or one that isn’t being worn or carried, the light shines from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the affected object with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the light.
If any of this spell’s area overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created the darkness is dispelled.

fields.name: Feign Death
fields.description: You put a willing creature into a state indistinguishable from death
fields.effect: For the spell’s duration, or until you use an action to touch the target and dismiss the spell, the target appears dead to all outward inspection and to spells used to determine the target’s status. The target is blinded and incapacitated, and its speed drops to 0. The target has resistance to all damage except psychic damage. If the target is diseased or poisoned when you cast the spell, or becomes diseased or poisoned while under the spell’s effect, the disease and poison have no effect until the spell ends.

fields.name: Tetherbound Soul
fields.description: You bind someone's soul to you, ensure death does not claim that
fields.effect:
Select a willing creature when you cast this spell. 

Until the spell effect ends, if this creature dies, its soul is bound to you. You can select at that moment to use the concentration or sustain 1 property to keep the soul in your possession. If you break the spell, the creature is considered to have died normally. You can only hold the spell for <your spellcasting modifier + proficiency tier>/2(round up) amount of hours

You may spend 5 minutes to place the soul back in the body and the target comes back to life with 1 hitpoint and the wounded. Once you do so, you cannot cast that spell on the target for the next 5 days.
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1). Select an additional creature to tether.
fields.components: V, F, M(50g of holy material)

fields.effect:

CS N/A

Doing 3D10 damage magical piercing on the first target hit. For each enemy hit or each 30ft of the missile travelled, the damage increases by 1D10. To a max of double the dice.

Those who end their turn in it must make a basic reflex save, or take 2D6 cold damage

Wrath: Make a spell attack, doing 2D12 magical bludgeoning damage
Blessing: You heal the creature for 2D8 hitpoints
fields.upcast_effect:
4(+1): Increase the healing by one dice
5(+1) Increase damage by one dice

fields.name: Tide's Blessing
fields.description: A swirling halo of crystalline water coils around you, gathering momentum and power. Your next few attack releases that pent‑up energy in a crashing surge of oceanic force, striking foes with the relentless might of a breaking wave.
fields.effect: The targetted creature next three weapon or unarmed attacks do additional 1D10 magical bludgoening damage and slow creatures by 10ft while giving the targetted creature 10ft of movement, stacking once

If you are below 25% hitpoints, your healing and damage done is doubled,

fields.name: Mad Monkey
fields.description: Magical monkey spirits fill the area as they pile and climb on top of one another.
fields.effect:
Because the monkeys are magical spirits, they can't be attacked or hurt. Casting calm or a similar effect over the monkeys makes them docile, causing them to cease making mischief for the duration of mad monkeys.

Choose the kind of mischief your monkeys make when you Cast the Spell. They produce the effect listed for that mischief when you Cast the Spell and the first time each round when you Sustain the spell. The first time each round when you Sustain the spell, you can move the area of the monkeys by 5 feet.
Flagrant Burglary The monkeys try to Steal any one item from one creature in the area. Use your spell DC – 10 as the monkeys' Thievery modifier. Their attempt relies more on distraction than subtlety, so the victim knows what item the monkeys were trying to take and whether it was taken. Getting a stolen item from the monkeys— even for the caster—requires Stealing it from them or Disarming them, using your spell DC. When the spell ends, any stolen items fall to the ground in any square of the spell's area you choose.
Raucous Din The monkeys screech loudly, potentially deafening creatures in the spell's area. Each creature in the spell's area must attempt a Fortitude save.
Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 10 minutes.
Success The creature is unaffected.
Failure The creature is deafened for 1 round.
Critical Failure The creature is deafened for 1 minute.
Tumultuous Gymnastics The monkeys jump and climb all over creatures in the spell's area, interfering with complex movements. Each creature in the spell's area must attempt a Reflex save.
Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 10 minutes.
Success The creature is unaffected.
Failure For 1 round, the creature must succeed at a DC 5 flat check whenever it attempts a manipulate action. If it fails this check, the action is disrupted.
Critical Failure As failure, but the monkeys cling to the creature tenaciously, and the effect lasts until the spell ends, even if the creature leaves the spell's area.

fields.name: Dive and Breach
fields.description: You dive into the plane of water and leap out back into the material plane
fields.effect: You Leap 10 feet, and where you would land on the ground, you instead disappear in a splash of water, your body entering the surface like a diver entering a pool. You then exit from an unoccupied surface within 40 feet, appearing in another splash of water as you Leap out, landing 10 feet away from where you exited. Each splash deals 3d10 bludgeoning damage to all creatures in a 5-foot radius; creatures in multiple splash zones take damage only once.

fields.name: Blastblack

fields.effect: You cast this spell when falling. You are immune to fall damage, but all other creatures in the spell's area take 6d4 bludgeoning damage. Creatures that fail their save are also pushed back 5 feet
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+2) Increase area by 10ft and increase damage by 1D4

fields.name: Cozy Cabin
fields.description: You create a simple cozy home
fields.effect:
You shape a cabin 20 feet on each side and 10 feet high. This cabin has the structure trait and the same restrictions as magic items that create structures. The walls of the hut are simple and wooden, with small, square glass windows, and it has one wooden door. It doesn't include its own lock, but it has a fastener to which a lock can be applied.

The interior contains three cots, one chamber pot, and a small fireplace holding a magical fire. The interior is lit with a small magical light that you can light or extinguish at will using a Sustain action. The climate inside the hut is comfortable and allows creatures inside it to withstand most hostile weather conditions, but incredible heat or cold, powerful storms, and winds of hurricane force or greater destroy the hut. Other creatures can freely enter and exit the hut without damaging it, but if you exit the hut, the spell ends. You can Dismiss the spell.
fields.components: V, F, M(at least 1kg of wood)

fields.name: Crashing Water
fields.description: You summon a crashing wave
fields.effect:
Creatures must make a save. They take 6D6 bludgeoning damage. Choose a wave direction

CF: They are knocked towards the end of the wave or 15ft, whichever is higher and knocked prone. Taking full damage
F: They are knocked 10ft away and knocked prone and take full damage
S: They take half damage and knocked 5ft away from the wave direction
CS: No effect

fields.effect: In a forrested area, you create a 30x30ft area that provides good living conditions and one that natural beast of the area ignore

fields.name: Misty Step

fields.effect: You teleport 40ft, you do not have to have line of sight. However if you teleport into a solid object, you immediately take 30 points of true damage and are forced out in the direction closest in an open space. If there is no open space within 10ft . You take 10 true damage each turn and begin suffocating

fields.name: Analyse Magic
fields.description: You analyse a type of magic
fields.effect: You know the classification and description of a magic and if it is a spell you know the exact spell. If it is a completely new magical effect. You need to succeed an Arcana(Spell Craft) of DC20-35 based on the GM choice.  You however know the rough effect of the magic and it's properties

fields.name: Void Scatter
fields.description: You send out a blast of void energy, forcing enemies away.

Those in the area must make a reflex save. Taking 4D10 force damage

The target must make a saving throw

fields.effect: The selected undead creatures gains a +15ft of movement speed and +2 to dodge, reflex saves and attack rolls

fields.name: Wind of Death
fields.description: A necrotic wind blows, decaying flesh and bones
fields.effect:
Those in the area must make a fortitude save. Taking 4D10 necrotic damage

CF: They take the maximum possible damage from the dice
F They take full damage 
S They take half damage
CS No effect

fields.name: Piercing Bolts of Burning
fields.description: A wizard sends several fiery missiles towards his target.
fields.effect: The castes makes 5 spell attack, each with +5 armor piercing. Each bolt does 1D10 damage, if a target is hit by more than 4 bolt, they take an additional D10 damage.  If a target is targetted by more than one attack, the highest roll is counted when using for armor piercing.

The creatures in the area make a saving throw. They have to make repeat saving throws every turn as long as they are in the area at the start of their turn unless they critically succeed

CF They have their speed reduced by half, have disadvantage on reflex and will saving throws and reduced their armor and dodge by 5

S Their speed is reduced by 15ft and they gain a -2 on dodge and armor
