fields.name: Aura of Life
fields.description: Life preserving energy radiates from you
fields.effect: Until the spell ends, the aura moves with you, centered on you. Each non-hostile creature in the aura (including you) has resistance to necrotic damage, and its hit point maximum can’t be reduced. In addition, a non-hostile, living creature regains 1 hit point when it starts its turn in the aura with 0 hit points.

fields.name: Control Water
fields.description: You bend water at will.
fields.effect:
You can choose from any of the following effects when you cast this spell. As an action on your turn, you can repeat the same effect or choose a different one.

Flood: You cause the water level of all standing water in the area to rise by as much as 20 feet. If the area includes a shore, the flooding water spills over onto dry land. If you choose an area in a large body of water, you instead create a 20-foot tall wave that travels from one side of the area to the other and then crashes down. Any Huge or smaller vehicles in the wave's path are carried with it to the other side. Any Huge or smaller vehicles struck by the wave have a 25 percent chance of capsizing. The water level remains elevated until the spell ends or you choose a different effect. If this effect produced a wave, the wave repeats on the start of your next turn while the flood effect lasts.

Part Water: You cause water in the area to move apart and create a trench. The trench extends across the spell's area, and the separated water forms a wall to either side. The trench remains until the spell ends or you choose a different effect. The water then slowly fills in the trench over the course of the next round until the normal water level is restored.

Redirect Flow: You cause flowing water in the area to move in a direction you choose, even if the water has to flow over obstacles, up walls, or in other unlikely directions. The water in the area moves as you direct it, but once it moves beyond the spell's area, it resumes its flow based on the terrain conditions. The water continues to move in the direction you chose until the spell ends or you choose a different effect.

Whirlpool: This effect requires a body of water at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep. You cause a whirlpool to form in the center of the area. The whirlpool forms a vortex that is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, and 25 feet tall. Any creature or object in the water and within 25 feet of the vortex is pulled 10 feet toward it. A creature can swim away from the vortex by making a Strength (Athletics) check against your spell save DC. When a creature enters the vortex for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a fortitude saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage and is caught in the vortex until the spell ends. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage, and isn't caught in the vortex. A creature caught in the vortex can use its action to try to swim away from the vortex as described above, but has disadvantage on the Strength (Athletics) check to do so. The first time each turn that an object enters the vortex, the object takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage, this damage occurs each round it remains in the vortex.
fields.components: V, F, M(Water of 100x100x100ft at least)

fields.name: Summon Demon
fields.description: You summon a demon
fields.effect: You summon a creature with the demon tag as long as it its 3rd level or below. You can choose sustain or concentration If one breaks, the demon acts as it normally would and is no longer bound to you.

fields.name: Aqua Prison
fields.description: A ball of water is thrown, trapping those caught inside
fields.effect:
They must make a basic reflex save or be trapped in the prison. If they are in the prison they must make a atheletics check against your DC as an action in an attempt to break free. The prison ends when the spell does

When trapped in the prison, they are considered incapcitated and automatically fail reflex saves and gain a -10 to dodge.

fields.name: Dimension Door
fields.description: An arcane door appears, giving a gateway
fields.effect:
You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as “200 feet straight downward” or “upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle, 300 feet.”
You can bring along objects as long as their weight doesn’t exceed what you can carry. You can also bring one willing creature of your size or smaller who is carrying gear up to its carrying capacity. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you cast this spell.
If you would arrive in a place already occupied by an object or a creature, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 force damage, and the spell fails to teleport you.

fields.name: Confusion
fields.description: You muddles someone mind
fields.effect:
Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range must succeed on a saving throw when you cast this spell or be affected by it.

An affected target can't take reactions and must roll a d10 at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior for that turn.

1: The creature uses all its movement to move in a random direction. To determine the direction, roll a d8 and assign a direction to each die face. The creature doesn't take an action this turn.

2-6: The creature doesn't move or take actions this turn.

7-8: The creature uses its action to make a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach. If there is no creature within its reach, the creature does nothing this turn.

9-10: The creature can act and move normally.

At the end of its turns, an affected target can make a Wisdom saving throw. If it succeeds, this effect ends for that target.

fields.name: Charm Monster
fields.description: Strange magic manipulates a monster's mind
fields.effect: You can charm a creature  It must make a saving throw, and it does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is charmed by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it. The charmed creature is friendly to you. When the spell ends, the creature knows it was charmed by you.

fields.name: Competative Edge
fields.description: You create a supernatural need to surprass someone else
fields.effect: Select a creature to be the target and succeed a competitor. The target gains a +1 bonus to all D20 rolls. The bonus increases by one for every sucessfull D20 roll to a max of 5. If the competitor critically succeeds a type of roll, the target gains a +5 to that type of roll to a max stack of 5 from normwl success

fields.name: Bridge of Vines
fields.description: You create a bridge of thick vines
fields.effect:
You create a bridge of vines in a straight line up to 60 feet, forming a 10-foot-wide bridge that can cross over difficult terrain and low obstacles, as well as reach higher ground. The bridge has an armor equal to your spell DC, Hardness 10, and 40 Hit Points. It is immune to critical hits. The bridge lasts either for the duration of the spell, until it is destroyed, or until you Dismiss the spell.

While the spell is active, you and your allies can use the bridge normally. If any other creatures attempt to use the bridge, the vines attempt to trip and entangle them. They must attempt a Reflex save against your spell DC.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target treats the length of the bridge as difficult terrain.
Failure As success, and the target is knocked prone.
Critical Failure As success, and the target is knocked prone and grabbed until it Escapes (with a DC equal to your spell DC) or the spell ends..

fields.name: Hemorrage
fields.description: You cause unstoppable bleeding
fields.effect:
The selected creatures must make a fortitude save. They are immune to the spell efffect if they cannot bleed or if they do not require blood for bodily functions

CF: For the next minute every time the creature takes piercing or slashing damage. They take 1D10 true damage every turn until they spend 2 actions to redo the fortitude save. If they take damage again, they still take the damage and must redo the save
F: For the next minute every time the creature takes piercing or slashing damage. They take 1D6 true damage every turn until they spend 2 actions to redo the fortitude save. If they take damage again, they still take the damage and must redo the save
S:  Till the end of the creature's next turn every time the creature takes piercing or slashing damage. They take 1D6 true damage every turn until they spend 2 actions to redo the fortitude save. If they take damage again, they still take the damage and must redo the save
CS: N/A
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1) Increase the damage by one tier

fields.name: Beastial Curse
fields.description: You curse someone to grow strange beastial manipulation
fields.effect:
Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target's body gains minor bestial features. Its insides churn as they partially transform, causing it to be weakened(dexterity) 1 for 1 round. When it recovers from the clumsy condition, its features revert to normal, and the spell ends.
Failure The target transforms into a bestial form for 1 hour. The target becomes weakened(dexterity) 1 and gains weakness to silver. It gains a claw, hoof, horn, or jaws Strike (your choice) that uses the target's unarmed Strike statistics except that the damage type changes to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing, as appropriate. 
Critical Failure As failure, but the duration is unlimited.

fields.name: Aromatic Lure
fields.description: You create an irristable smell
fields.effect:
Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target is distracted by the tantalizing scents, becoming stunned 1 for 1 round.
Failure The target is stunned 2 and moves toward the selected location via the most direct route possible for 1 round, bypassing any obvious hazards and enemies in the way.
Critical Failure The target is stunned 4 and moves to the selected location via the most direct route possible for 1 round, bypassing any obvious hazards and enemies in the way. If the creature reaches the destination, it must remain in that location for 1d4 rounds but can otherwise act normally.

fields.name: Air Walk
fields.description: You can walk on air
fields.effect: The target can walk on air as if it were solid ground. It can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle.

fields.name: Flame Strike
fields.description: You call a bolt of divine energy to crash down from the sky.
fields.effect:
Those in the area must make a reflex save. Taking 4D6 fire damage, and 4D6 radiant damage 

CF:  They take the maximum damage from dice 
F    They take full damage
S   Half damage
CS They take 2 fire and 2 radiant damage

fields.name: Clairvoyence
fields.description: You create an eye to see from all directions
fields.effect: You create an invisible floating eye at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect). The eye can't move, but you can see in all directions from that point as if using your normal visual senses.

fields.name: Elemental Infusion
fields.description: You infuse someone with elemental power
fields.effect: Select an elemental type, the creature gains resistance to that elemental damage. In addition ranged or melee attacks do additional 1D12 damage of that elemental type

fields.name: Elemental Bane
fields.description: You make someone resistant to the elements
fields.effect: The creature becomes immune to one elemental damage type
fields.upcast_effect: 8: Select another creature to recieve the benefit

fields.name: Detect Scying
fields.description: You sense if someone is scrying
fields.effect: For the duration of the spell, you are immediately notified if a scrying spell is active and you can use a contested spell check to attempt to remove it

fields.name: Lie Detection
fields.description: You detect truths and faleshood in action and words
fields.effect: When you hear words, the GM tells you if its a lie, truth or partial truth

fields.name: Conduct Lightning
fields.description: You use a metallic object to conudct lightning, overcharging it
fields.effect:
You must hold a metallic weapon out. For the rest of the spell's duration, your melee attacks with thet matallic weapon(or with your unarmed attacks if you held an empty hand aloft) deals an additional 1D8 lightning damage. You can also instead use it to make a basic ranged attack with a range of 80ft that do 1D8 lightning damage and ignore armor. 

The spell creates its own storm cloud if necessary, so you can cast draw the lightning anywhere, even underground. If draw the lightning is cast outside under a cloudy or stormy sky, increase the dice by 1 

You can spend an additional action to change the dice by one tier

fields.name: Grasp of the deep
fields.description: Phantasmal pressure of the deep sea reach out
fields.effect:
The creature makes a saving throw, taking 4D10 magical bludgeoning damage 

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The target takes half damage.
Failure The target takes full damage, and feels as though it's being crushed. The target becomes grappled but it can attempt to Escape with an Escape DC equal to your spell DC.
Critical Failure As failure, but the target takes double damage.

fields.name: Water's Memory
fields.description: You see the memory of water
fields.effect: You see what the selected body of water, with at least 5x5x5ft of water had seen in the past 24 hours. You remained at focus in a trance when reading the memory
fields.upcast_effect: 6: You see its memories for a week

fields.name: Mirage
fields.description: You reate a large false image
fields.effect:
You create an illusion that causes natural terrain to look, sound, feel, and smell like a different kind of terrain. This doesn't disguise any structures or creatures in the area.

Any creature that touches the illusion or uses the Seek action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.
fields.upcast_effect: 5: Your image can also disguise structures or create illusory structures (but still doesn't disguise creatures).

fields.name: Shield of Thorns
fields.description: The caster calls a thick layer of spiky thorns to ward its allies.
fields.effect: The selected creatures gains +5 armor, and when they are hit by a melee attack, the attacker of the target takes 1D6 piercing damage per 10 damage done.
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1): You can select one more target

fields.name: Ocular Overload
fields.description: You assault a creature with jarring illusions in response to a hostile
fields.effect:
Just as a creature is about to attack you, you assault them with jarring illusions, completely surrounding their eyes with blinding flashes of motion and color. When the spell is complete, you gain the Overload Vision reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

Trigger A creature within 60 feet would make an attack roll against you; Effects The triggering creature must attempt a Fortitude save.
Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target is dazzled until the end of the current turn.
Failure The target is blinded until the end of the current turn.
Critical Failure The target is blinded until the end of the current turn and dazzled for 1 minute.

fields.name: Alter Memory
fields.description: You change a memory
fields.effect:
You alter the target's memories by erasing a memory, enhancing a memory's clarity, altering a memory, or adding a false memory. The target can attempt a Will save to resist the spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and realizes you tried to alter its memory.
Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of alter memory, unless it identifies the spell.
Failure During the first 5 minutes of the spell's duration, you can Sustain the spell to modify a memory once each round. When you do, you imagine up to 6 seconds of memory to modify, to a maximum of 5 continuous minutes of memory.

Any memories you've altered remain changed as long as the spell is active. If the target moves out of range before the 5 minutes is up, you can't alter any further memories
fields.upcast_effect: You can Cast the Spell on a willing target to suppress all memory of a particular topic, detailed in 50 words or fewer. The effect is permanent, and it patches these omissions with an indistinct haze.

fields.name: Explosive Mine
fields.description: You create an explosive charge that detonate when touched on
fields.effect: You place a min3 that is primed automatically after 1 minute, or when you spend an action to touch and prime it. When you do prime it, select a trigger weight. When a creature of that weight step over it, they must make a basic reflex save, taking 6D8 fire damage, or half as much as a success. The mine looks like a small object of your choosing , and require an arcana check to determine its purpose
fields.upcast_effect:
5(+1) Additional D8
6: Increase duration to one week
7: Increase duration to one month
8: Increase duration to one year
fields.components: F, M(Small object made of materials worth 100g)

fields.name: Soulblight
fields.description: The caster weakens one will to survive the battle
fields.effect:
The target in the area must make a will saving throw

CF The target gains disadvantage on will saving throws, gains a -2 to reflex saved, dodge and attack rolls
F The target gains -2 on will saving throws and dodge
S The target gains a -1 to dodge or will saving throws. The caster chooses
CS N/A
fields.upcast_effect:
4: Increase radius to 25ft
6: Increase radius to 40ft

fields.name: Transmutation of Lead
fields.description: You make weapons heavy and cumbersome
fields.effect: Select a non-magical metallic weapon you can see. You make its attacks do half damage and it's armor piercing reduced by 5.
fields.upcast_effect:
5: You can select Uncommon magical items
7: You can select rare magical items
9: You can select Very Rare magical items

fields.name: Telepathy
fields.description: You speak through only the mind
fields.effect: You communicate telepathically with another creature in range.  The creature must accept your connection
fields.upcast_effect:
5: Increase range to 2km
6: Increase range to 100km

fields.name: Planar Ward
fields.description: You ward youself against a certain plain
fields.effect: Select a plane of existence, against creatures that originate from that plane, the target gain advantage on saving throws and Ward 4. This only works if you are not in the same plane as the chosen plane

fields.name: Spike Stones
fields.description: Long sharp spikes stone thrust up from the ground
fields.effect:
In the targetted area, the terrain becomes difficult terrain. Creaturs who end their turn in the area take 2 piercing damage.  

For every 5ft of movement a creature takes in the area, they take 4 piercing damage

fields.name: Elemental Weakness
fields.description: You weakene someone to certain elements
fields.effect: The selected creature gains weakness to a type of elemental damage for the duration of the spell. This has no effect if the creature is resistant or immune to that damage type.
fields.upcast_effect: 6(+2) You can select an additional creature

fields.name: Propheris Omens
fields.description: You receieve prophetic omens
fields.effect: You peek into the future. Choose a particular goal or activity you plan to engage in within 1 week, or an event you expect might happen within 1 week. You learn a cryptic clue or piece of advice that could help with the chosen event, often in the form of a rhyme or omen.

fields.name: Psyhic Withering
fields.description: You corrode someone minds with doubt and crisis
fields.effect:
The target makes a saving throw, taking 4D8 psyhic damage

CF The target gains a -10 penalty to saves against frightened effect and gain disadvantage on reflex and will saves. This effect last for the duration of the spell
F They gain -5 penalty to saves against fear and disadvantage on will saves, this last for the duration of the spell until the spell ends
S They gain a -2 on saves on frightened effects until the spell ends
CS N/A

fields.name: Grasping Vine
fields.description: A large vine is summoned wraps itself around an enemy and they are yanked
fields.effect:
You conjure a vine that sprouts from the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. The vine can be targetted and is considered a plant with 8HP and dodge and armor equal to your spell DC. You can direct the vine to lash out at a creature within 30 feet of it that you can see. That creature must succeed on a saving throw or be pulled 20 feet directly toward the vine.

Until the spell ends, you can direct the vine to lash out at the same creature or another one as a action on each of your turns.

fields.name: Fire Cloak
fields.description: You summon a cloak of fire to shield
fields.effect: You gain resistance to cold damage, and whenever a creature ends its turn within 5ft of you, they take 2D8 fire damage
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1) Increase amount of dice by one

fields.name: Ice Cloak
fields.description: You summon a cloak of ice to shield
fields.effect: You gain resistance to fire damage, whenever you are attacked by a melee attack, you reduce the attacker's hitpoints by 5ft(stacking once) and take 2D6 cold danage
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1) Increase amount of damage dice by one

fields.name: Lightning Cloak
fields.description: You summon a cloak of lightning to shield
fields.effect: Whenever a creature within 10ft with metal equipment end their turn, they must make a reflex save. On a failure they take 2D8 lightning damage.

fields.name: Nadrad's Black Tentacles
fields.description: Deadly void tentacles appear from the ground grasping foes
fields.effect:
For the duration, these tentacles turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.

When a creature enters the affected area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the creature must succeed on a reflex saving throw or take 3d6 magical bludgeoning damage and be restrained by the tentacles until the spell ends. A creature that starts its turn in the area and is already restrained by the tentacles takes 3d6 magical ,bludgeoning damage.

A creature restrained by the tentacles can use its action to make a Atheletics check or a Reflex save (its choice) against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself.
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1): Increase both damage by one dice

fields.name: Ice Storm
fields.description: A storm of sharp ice is summoned
fields.effect:
Those in the area must make a reflex save.  The area is turned into slippery terrain and those inside take 2D10 bludgeoning damage and 5D6 cold damage 

CF Take full damage and twice the amount of cold amage
F Take full damage
S Take half damage
CS Only take half the cold damage.
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1): Increase cold damage by two dice

fields.name: Locate Creature
fields.description: You find a creature
fields.effect:
Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the creature’s location, as long as that creature is within 1,000 feet of you. If the creature is moving, you know the direction of its movement.
The spell can locate a specific creature known to you, or the nearest creature of a specific kind (such as a human or a unicorn), so long as you have seen such a creature up close—within 30 feet—at least once. If the creature you described or named is in a different form, such as being under the effects of a polymorph spell, this spell doesn’t locate the creature.
This spell can’t locate a creature if running water at least 10 feet wide blocks a direct path between you and the creature.

fields.name: Guadian of Faith
fields.description: You summon a spectrual radiant guardian that guards you and your allie
fields.effect: You summon a spectral guardian with a hitpoints of 60 with an armor of 15 that has 0 dodge and cannot have a critical hit landed on. Whenever a hostile creature moves out of range of the guardian, attacks an ally or attacks the guardian when they are 15ft radius takes 20 radiant damage while the guardian loses 20 hitpoints.

fields.name: Freedom of Movement
fields.description: You gain unprecedented mobility, breaking simple physical restraints
fields.effect:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target’s movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target’s speed nor cause the target to be paralyzed or restrained.
The target can also spend 5 feet of movement to automatically escape from nonmagical restraints, such as manacles or a creature that has it grappled. Finally, being underwater imposes no penalties on the target’s movement or attacks.

fields.name: Edgewalker's Ward
fields.description: You tether yourself to life, springing you back whenever you fall to far
fields.effect: Whenever you drop below 0 HP, as long as you don't drop below -5 hitpoints, you instead drop to 1 hitpoint.
fields.upcast_effect:
5: Change the -5 to -7
7: Change the -5 to -10

fields.name: Wall of Fire
fields.description: You summon a wall of fire
fields.effect:
You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d8 fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

You can move this wall as a single action, moving it up to 20ft
fields.target: 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick

fields.name: Wall of Stone
fields.description: You erect a wall of stone
fields.effect:
You shape a wall of solid stone. You create a 1-inch-thick wall of stone up to 80 feet long, and 20 feet high. You can shape the wall's path, placing each 5 feet of the wall on the border between squares. The wall doesn't need to stand vertically, so you can use it to form a bridge or set of stairs, for example. You must conjure the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost.

The wall has an armor of 15, ,is immune to critical hits and psyhic damage. In addition, it is resistant to piercing and slashing damage.,
fields.upcast_effect:
5(+1) Increase the HP of the wall by 10
6: Increase the length by 30ft

fields.name: Sanguine Mist
fields.description: You unleash a cloud of block sucking fog to drain vitality from the living while bolstering your own
fields.effect:
You unleash a cloud of foul, blood-sucking fog that drains the vitality from the living to bolster your own. Each living creature in the area when you Cast the Spell, aside from you, takes 6d6 necrotic damage with a basic Fortitude save. Creatures in the area are Concealed, and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it.

The first time each round you Sustain this Spell on subsequent turns, living creatures in the area take an additional 2d6 necrotic damage with another basic Fortitude save. You also gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the damage a single creature took when you Sustained the spell this turn; calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage.
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1) Increase intial damage by 2D6 and subsequent damage by 1D6

fields.name: Light of Battle
fields.description: Light infuses an ally, giving them inhuman courage
fields.effect: The target creature gains a +5 on will saving throws and is immune to fear effects. In addition, their melee attacks do additional 1D8 radiant damage

fields.name: Stone Shape
fields.description: You shape and bend stone to your will
fields.effect: You touch a stone object of Medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose. So, for example, you could shape a large rock into a weapon, idol, or coffer, or make a small passage through a wall, as long as the wall is less than 5 feet thick. You could also shape a stone door or its frame to seal the door shut. The object you create can have up to two hinges and a latch, but finer mechanical detail isn’t possible.

fields.name: Psyhic Lance
fields.description: You unleash a quickt but .devestating psyhic assault
fields.effect:
The target makes a will saving throw, taking 7D6 psyhic damage.

CF The target is incapitated until the end of your next turn, takes full damage and gains Stupedified 1 for the next minute
F The target is incapictated until the start of your next turn and takes full damage
S The target takes half damage and gains stupefied 1 until the end of its next turn
CS: No effect
fields.upcast_effect: 5(+1) Increase dice by one tier till D12

fields.name: Storm Shape
fields.description: You manipulate a storm to do your bidding
fields.effect: You find a natural weather such as a downpour or storm. You can dismiss it, or alternatively intensify it. You can choose to change its direction, moving up to twice as fat as it normall would up to 5 kilometers away from max range

fields.name: Synchronicity
fields.description: You shift reality ever so slightly in a creature's favor
fields.effect:
You subtly bend fate and perception around the target, allowing them to flow effortlessly through the world as though the cosmos itself aligns to ease their path. While under the effects of synchronicity, the target experiences extraordinary convenience and uncanny timing:
	•	The target treats difficult terrain caused by crowds or non-magical obstacles as normal terrain, and can Stride through occupied spaces without requiring Acrobatics checks, though they cannot end their turn in another creature’s space.
	•	The target is treated as always having cover for purposes of Stealth checks, granting them a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks and enabling Hide and Sneak actions even when it seems no cover is available.
	•	The target gains a +2 bonus to all checks related to riding or piloting ;
	•	When the target uses a move action that would provoke a reaction (such as a Step or Stride), the triggering creature gains disadvantage on its roll
Clash of Destinies:
If two or more creatures under the effect of synchronicity would attempt conflicting actions (such as both trying to pass through the same narrow space first), each involved creature must roll a Charisma check (DC determined by the highest Charisma modifier among them). The creature with the highest result acts first or benefits from the effect; ties are resolved by initiative order or GM discretion.

fields.name: Arcane Reflex
fields.description: With magic, you give someone supernatural reflexes
fields.effect: The targetted creature gains +2 on reflex saves and dodge.

fields.name: Secret Chest
fields.description: You create a container to hide its contents in another plane
fields.effect:
You hide a chest, and all its contents, on the Ethereal Plane. You must touch the chest and the miniature replica that serves as a material component for the spell. The chest can contain up to 12 cubic feet of nonliving material (3 feet by 2 feet by 2 feet).

While the chest remains on the Ethereal Plane, you can use an action and touch the replica to recall the chest. It appears in an unoccupied space on the ground within 5 feet of you. You can send the chest back to the Ethereal Plane by using an action and touching both the chest and the replica.

After 60 days, there is a cumulative 5 percent chance per day that the spell’s effect ends. This effect ends if you cast this spell again, if the smaller replica chest is destroyed, or if you choose to end the spell as an action. If the spell ends and the larger chest is on the Ethereal Plane, it is irretrievably lost.
fields.components: V, S, M(A chest made of materials at least 1,000 gold)

fields.name: Greater Invisibility
fields.description: You give an evolved formed of invisibility
fields.effect: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target’s person.

fields.name: Gate Seal
fields.description: You fortify the fabirc of a plane
fields.effect: You fortify the fabric of the planes within a 30-foot cube you can see within range. Within that area, portals close and can't be opened for the duration. Spells and other effects that allow planar travel or open portals such as gate or plane shift, fail if used to enter or leave the area. The cube is stationary.

fields.name: Steal Voice
fields.description: You fsteel a voice
fields.effect:
You steal a creature's voice, rendering them mute. The effect is determined by the target's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute. A creature that has no voice or can't speak is immune to this spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target becomes voiceless until the end of its next turn. A voiceless creature can't speak, create vocal sounds, or take auditory actions (including supplying verbal or command components). As long as the target is voiceless, whenever you speak, you can choose to have your voice sound like either your voice or the target's voice.
Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.
Critical Failure As success, but the duration is permanent.

fields.name: Rigid Form
fields.description: You use nature's wood rigility to enhance yourself
fields.effect: The target gains a +5 to saving throws against polymorph effects

fields.name: Dominate Person
fields.description: You break the will of someone and bend them to their will
fields.effect:
The target makes a saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target is stunned 1 as it fights off your commands.
Failure You control the target.  You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to the creature while you are conscious (no action required), which it does its best to obey. You can specify a simple and general course of action, such as “Attack that creature,” “Run over there,” or “Fetch that object.” If the creature completes the order and doesn’t receive further direction from you, it defends and preserves itself to the best of its ability.
You can use two actions to take total and precise control of the target. Until the end of your next turn, the creature takes only the actions you choose, and doesn’t do anything that you don’t allow it to do. During this time you can also cause the creature to use a reaction, but this requires you to use your own reaction as well. . At the end of each of its turns. On a success, the spell ends.
Critical Failure As a failure, but the target receives a new save only if you give it a new order that is against its nature, such as killing its allies.

fields.name: Bigby Hand
fields.description: You create a large spectural hand to do your bidding
fields.effect:
You create a Large hand of shimmering, translucent force in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. The hand lasts for the spell’s duration, and it moves at your command, mimicking the movements of your own hand.

The hand is an object that has Armor of 10, dodge of 0, immune to critical hit and resistant to non-magical damage it has hit points equal to your hit point maximum. If it drops to 0 hit points, the spell ends. It has a Strength of 26 (+8) and a Dexterity of 10 (+0). The hand doesn’t fill its space.

When you cast the spell and as a bonus action on your subsequent turns, you can move the hand up to 60 feet and then cause one of the following effects with it.

Clenched Fist. The hand strikes one creature or object within 5 feet of it. Make a melee spell attack for the hand using your game statistics. On a hit, the target takes 4d8 force damage.
Forceful Hand. The hand attempts to push a creature within 5 feet of it in a direction you choose. Make a check with the hand’s Strength contested by the Strength (Athletics) check of the target. If the target is Medium or smaller, you have advantage on the check. If you succeed, the hand pushes the target up to 5 feet plus a number of feet equal to five times your spellcasting ability modifier. The hand moves with the target to remain within 5 feet of it.
Grasping Hand. The hand attempts to grapple a Huge or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. You use the hand’s Strength score to resolve the grapple. If the target is Medium or smaller, you have advantage on the check. While the hand is grappling the target, you can use a bonus action to have the hand crush it. When you do so, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to 2d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Interposing Hand. The hand interposes itself between you and a creature you choose until you give the hand a different command. The hand moves to stay between you and the target, providing you with half cover against the target. The target can’t move through the hand’s space if its Strength score is less than or equal to the hand’s Strength score. If its Strength score is higher than the hand’s Strength score, the target can move toward you through the hand’s space, but that space is difficult terrain for the target.
